analysis.key_quote: Moreover, the OPM proposed rule to dismantle civil service protections destabilizes the career-workforce, politicizes the day-to-day work of government, and erodes the very idea of a professional, independent civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its negative impact on civil service protections and the professional integrity of the workforce, indicating a clear stance against the politicization of government roles.
